previewArticle.title: Chivas USA vs. Philadelphia Union | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Chivas USA 0, Philadelphia Union 3 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: A couple of teams needing a buoying victory meet when Chivas USA play host to Philadelphia Union on Saturday evening at StubHub Center.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Chivas USA vs Philadelphia Union | May 31, 2014

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: LB
timelineItems.text: Dan Kennedy ties club record for appearances. #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: Jorge Morales
timelineItems.text: @blackarmy1850 @chidojerry  @dino1er @xpearlx11 @eyelovesmusic @jon_drummer go @chivasusa #CHIVASUSA #stubhub

timelineItems.name: Dave Zeitlin
timelineItems.text: Nothing like playing alongside Fred in an empty stadium against the league's worst team for Mo Edu to forget his World Cup disappointment.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Erick Torres (Chivas USA).
Maurice Edu (Philadelphia Union) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Little MLS Blog
timelineItems.text: AR frantically waving a foul but ref apparently disagrees. #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: Betsy Torres
timelineItems.text: #chivasusa #allyoucaneat #ibetfivebucks #vip #saturdayfun

timelineItems.name: CD Gonzalez
timelineItems.text: If Hack is going to keep converting players into CB, maybe he should try Wenger there. Wasn't that his spot most of college? #doop

timelineItems.name: jesterwords
timelineItems.text: Lovely footwork by Fred, followed up by a turnover that leads to a Chivas counter. Shades of last week. #DOOP #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: Bronze Locria
timelineItems.text: Back for the game! #DOOP #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: jesterwords
timelineItems.text: Conner Casey doing some running around chasing the ball but not overly involved at all in this game, as usual per his current form. #doop

timelineItems.name: Colin Campbell
timelineItems.text: Cruz looks like hes been playing for 80 minutes and were only 13 minutes in #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: Dave Zeitlin
timelineItems.text: Fun fact: the last time Fred started for the @PhilaUnion (Oct. 2010 vs. NYRB), he scored. And @15AleMoreno had the assist.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Philadelphia Union. Conceded by Donny Toia.

timelineItems.name: Steve Holroyd
timelineItems.text: Edu not making anyone question his exclusion from #USMNT #DOOP

timelineItems.name: CD Gonzalez
timelineItems.text: At least @PhilaUnion has realized @raygaddis belongs in the XI EVERY game. Team #heart&hustle #doop

timelineItems.name: DLH
timelineItems.text: at least okugo came to play tonight #DOOP #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Philadelphia Union. Vincent Nogueira tries a through ball, but Raymon Gaddis is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: DLH
timelineItems.text: i say send Edu back to England and develop our young lads #doop #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: .@1dankennedy ties the #ChivasUSA record for all-time appearances tonight with 123. Ties Jonathan Bornstein and Francisco Mendoza #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: .@1dankennedy empata el record de #ChivasUSA con 123 participaciones. Kennedy empata con Jonathan Bornstein y Francisco Mendoza #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: monicazyoung
timelineItems.text: Arriba #chivasusa #hhtyd2 #toothless

timelineItems.desc: Cross in from Philadelphia Union is cleared out by Dan Kennedy (Chivas USA) with a punch.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Dan Kennedy punches away a Union cross

timelineItems.name: The U Match Day
timelineItems.text: The traveling @PhilaUnion fans are making some noise here at the StubHub Center. #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Chivas USA 0, Philadelphia Union 3.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: Conor Casey brace fuels @PhilaUnion road resurgence. Highlights: http://t.co/qaTgGhotw7 #CHVvPHI http://t.co/5lpzi5eMVl

timelineItems.desc: A couple of teams needing a buoying victory meet when Chivas USA play host to Philadelphia Union on Saturday evening at StubHub Center.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Chivas USA vs Philadelphia Union | May 31, 2014

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: 20’ No clear scoring opportunities for either team. We’re scoreless at the StubHub Center #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Philadelphia Union. Conceded by Tony Lochhead.

timelineItems.name: jesterwords
timelineItems.text: The @PhilaUnion are going to have to score from a set piece to open things up. #DOOP #CHVvPHL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Danny Cruz (Philadelphia Union).
Dan Kennedy (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: DLH
timelineItems.text: time to bring in pfeffer #doop #CHVvPHL

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Marco Delgado (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Dave Zeitlin
timelineItems.text: When you want to draw a handball just outside the box, you ALWAYS turn to Grandpa Fred.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Vincent Nogueira (Philadelphia Union) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Cristián Maidana.

timelineItems.desc: Penalty conceded by Martin Rivero (Chivas USA) with a hand ball in the penalty area.
timelineItems.title: PENALTY: Martin Rivero gets an arm on the ball in the box

timelineItems.name: The U Match Day
timelineItems.text: Good overlapping run from Nogueira, who fires in a cross and forces Kennedy to dive out from his line in order to control it. #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: jesterwords
timelineItems.text: Indirect free kick! On of my favorite plays in soccer. #DOOP

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Cristián Maidana (Philadelphia Union) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Vincent Nogueira.
Penalty conceded by Martin Rivero (Chivas USA) with a hand ball in the penalty area.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Chivas USA 0, Philadelphia Union 1. Conor Casey (Philadelphia Union) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner
timelineItems.title: PK GOAL: Conor Casey makes no mistake with the spot kick

timelineItems.name: The U Match Day
timelineItems.text: Penalty! Chivas USA called for a handball inside the area and the Union will line up from the spot. #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: 27' Foul inside the box, PK for Philadelphia #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.comment: (Philadelphia Union) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
6-second violation by Dan Kennedy (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Dave Zeitlin
timelineItems.text: If Chivas keeps using their hands to play soccer, the Union might win this thing.

timelineItems.name: DLH
timelineItems.text: PK PK PK PK #doop #CHVvPHL

timelineItems.name: jesterwords
timelineItems.text: Here comes that set piece goal I was talking about to open up the game. #DOOP #CHVvPHL

timelineItems.name: nick
timelineItems.text: CASEY! #DOOP

timelineItems.name: Colin Campbell
timelineItems.text: I think the Union only score on PKs #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: The U Match Day
timelineItems.text: GOAL @PhilaUnion!!!! Conor Casey fires the PK past Kennedy to put the Union up, 1-0. #DOOP #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: Max Schaffer
timelineItems.text: 1-0 #doop

timelineItems.name: DLH
timelineItems.text: caseyyyyyyy #doop

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: Conor Casey converts a PK as Union take a 1-0 lead over #ChivasUSA in 28th minute. Strange sequence there, including a back pass in the box

timelineItems.name: Pat Andrews
timelineItems.text: Somewhere @15AleMoreno is yelling big country conor Casey #doop

timelineItems.name: John Cruice
timelineItems.text: Goal!! Casey buries the PK. #DOOP

timelineItems.name: jesterwords
timelineItems.text: PK GOOOOOOOOOOAAAAAAAAAAAALLLLLLLL from Conner Casey. 1-0 Philly. #DOOP #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: Kenny Price
timelineItems.text: That was a terrible call. Arm beside body. Not in unnatural position. #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: #ChivasUSA GK @1DanKennedy ties the club record for appearances at 123. Panchito Mendoza and @jonnybornstein also had 123

timelineItems.name: Erin Watson
timelineItems.text: I dont care if #chivasusa lose. I can be satisfied knowing #philadelphiaunion have the worst jerseys.

timelineItems.name: Shane Christie
timelineItems.text: The Union have the lead!!!! #DOOP

timelineItems.text: Video unclear on handling or hand-to-ball; I guess I wait for Simon Borg to tell me with certainty. #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: Rachel Whinnery
timelineItems.text: I'll #DOOP to that. � #CHVvPHI #PK

timelineItems.text: I hope that kicks up some life in Casey this year #doop #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.text: Let's see what the #Union do with the lead #uniontalk #doop

timelineItems.text: #union have two goals in the last two games from pks. #chvvphi #doop

timelineItems.text: GOAL! Conor Casey slams home to PK after a handball called on @PhilaUnion's free kick. 1-0 to the visitors. #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.text: After going 41 games without taking a penalty kick, the @PhilaUnion have now taken (and made) 4 in their last 9 games. #LateNightStatAlert

timelineItems.name: The U Match Day
timelineItems.text: HALFTIME: A Conor Casey goal in the 28th minute has @philaunion ahead, 1-0. Second half upcoming. #CHVvPHI http://t.co/u55sttLzGz

timelineItems.name: Derek Rawlings
timelineItems.text: So #chivasusa is just baaaad. Which is a shame because I really like Cubo Torres.

timelineItems.name: Sebastien Le Toux
timelineItems.text: Great job boys!! Let's keep going in the 2nd half & score another one. Happy for Conor's 1st goal, the start of a long series #DOOP

timelineItems.name: The U Match Day
timelineItems.text: HALFTIME: A Conor Casey goal in the 28th minute has @philaunion ahead, 1-0. Second half upcoming. #CHVvPHI http://t.co/u55sttLzGz

timelineItems.name: DLH
timelineItems.text: glad to see the squad owning the ball in a must win game #doop

timelineItems.name: DLH
timelineItems.text: dominating possession. i'll take it! #doop

timelineItems.name: Felicia Graumann
timelineItems.text: I think I could watch @raygaddis outrun his marks all day. #keepitup #doop

timelineItems.name: jesterwords
timelineItems.text: I want to see pfeffer, wenger, and possibly Leo (only as a late sub) sometime around the 55th to 60th minute in the 2nd half. #DOOP #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: @schuy1er
timelineItems.text: Chivas USA really about to lose two straight home games within 3 days after a week to prepare. #CHVvPHI #MLS

timelineItems.name: Philadelphia Union

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: Mauro Rosales replaces Marky Delgado at halftime for #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: Mike Bombowsky
timelineItems.text: First half was solid. Don't really understand why Hack won't play Wenger. Gotta be better than the 44 Smurf option. #DOOP

timelineItems.name: Steve Reilly
timelineItems.text: Union need to finish this game out and get 3 points #DOOP

timelineItems.name: jesterwords
timelineItems.text: Chivas might attack more now with the 2nd half substitute of Rosales. #CHVvPHI #DOOP Put in 4 more goals for a sign in section 128 next week

timelineItems.text: Halftime sub | Cambio: @MarkyDelgado out for @mdr7 #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: jesterwords
timelineItems.text: Watch the spacing of the Union in the second half. See if they are more disciplined wth positioning. #DOOP #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: Brian B.
timelineItems.text: love the man dearly, but i'm not sure "fred" and the phrase "savvy veteran" belong in the same sentence. #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: Eddie Magana
timelineItems.text: All alone today, not even my brothers wanted to come with me but it doesn't matter ⚽️�� it's better, no one to ask me to share my popcorn with ha � Chivas USA vs Philadelphia Union wooo ⚽️�� #ilovesoccer #chivasusa #win #mls #fearthegoat #chvvphi ���������⚽️�⚽️�⚽️�⚽️⚽️⚽️���

timelineItems.text: According to #DOOP announcer JP, the Union serve a lot of "teasing" balls in. #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.comment: Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: jesterwords
timelineItems.text: Four Union players standing within 10 yards of each other all not moving so they give it away. Ugly. #DOOP #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: Scott Kessler
timelineItems.text: Maidana smacks a pass at Edu instead of passing it back to Fabinho, touch is bad and Fabinho ends up fouling Rosales deep in the Union third

timelineItems.name: DLH
timelineItems.text: 30 mins from 3 pts! #doop

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Erick Torres (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Mike Pacific
timelineItems.text: #CHVvPHI is as disorganized and chaotic as foosball.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Lochhead sends nice ball in but foul called on Torres. Foul not called by the linesman near the incident intriguingly #mls #chvvphi

timelineItems.comment: Dangerous play by Fabinho (Philadelphia Union).
Marco Delgado (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Hand ball by Fred (Philadelphia Union).

Foul by Erick Torres (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: jesterwords
timelineItems.text: Clearly this is not what anyone would call, 'the beautiful game'. It is more like watching a tooth extraction. #DOOP #CHIvPHI

timelineItems.name: The U Match Day
timelineItems.text: Maidana tries to slip Fred through on a counter attack, but Kennedy comes off his line to possess just in time. #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.text: In a complete shocker, Cristian Maidana was too fancy and selfish on that last move. #DOOP #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.text: Nice defending by Maidana to block that Maidana backheel.

timelineItems.text: 3 yellow cards in a 2-minute span given out by referee Allen Chapman. Still Union 1, #ChivasUSA 0, 66th minute

timelineItems.text: Nogueira plays a ball over top to Cruz, who fires a shot with his left from outside the 18, but it rolls wide. #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: Dave Zeitlin
timelineItems.text: CONOR CASEY DIVING HEADER FOR A GOAL AFTER MIDNIGHT ALERT

timelineItems.text: There it is. #doop

timelineItems.text: CASEY!!!! Now that's a real goal!!!! #DOOP

timelineItems.name: Chris Spina
timelineItems.text: OMMMG!!! #DOOP

timelineItems.name: Jim Pisani
timelineItems.text: What a goal by Connor Casey!! Union lead 2-nil! #DOOP #UNION

timelineItems.name: Pat Masi
timelineItems.text: Wow. What a goal by the Union! #DOOP

timelineItems.name: Joe Tansey
timelineItems.text: Mo Edu moves forward, Maidana turns unselfish, Casey nods it in. 2-0. #DOOP #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.text: Casey finishes with a header off a cross from Cristian Maidana. Union 2, #ChivasUSA 0

timelineItems.text: casey geeked #doop

timelineItems.name: Brandon
timelineItems.text: Bigggggg country! #DOOP

timelineItems.name: Mark Graves
timelineItems.text: Holy shit GOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOAAAAAAALLLL!!! #doop

timelineItems.name: Mike Honick
timelineItems.text: What a beauty. Conner Casey with a hell of a header!!! 2-0 Union #DOOP

timelineItems.name: Brian B.
timelineItems.text: WE SCORED A GOAL FROM THE RUN OF PLAY BY USING CASEY'S NOGGIN TO DIRECT THE BALL INTO THE NET! #DOOP #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: C Sanders
timelineItems.text: Now that's the kind of Casey goal that gets me feeling hopeful #DOOP

timelineItems.name: Chris
timelineItems.text: Is Big Country back? #DOOP

timelineItems.name: Zach Dearie
timelineItems.text: What a goal!! What a play!! @MauriceEdu to @chacomaidana87 to BIG COUNTRY! C'mon boys! @PhilaUnion #DOOP

timelineItems.name: Dave Zeitlin
timelineItems.text: So Conor Casey, who hadn't scored before tonight, now has as many goals from the run of play as anyone else on the Union.

timelineItems.name: D.S.
timelineItems.text: Casey!!!!!!!! Maidana!!!!! #doop!!!!!

timelineItems.name: Jesse Simpson
timelineItems.text: What a beautiful ball by maidana! #DOOP

timelineItems.name: Shane Christie
timelineItems.text: What a diving header by the big man Casey! #DOOP

timelineItems.name: SoB Eric
timelineItems.text: #DOOP. If Casey gets a hat trick he will be tied for most goals on the team.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Danny Cruz (Philadelphia Union) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Zac MacMath.
Attempt blocked. Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Leandro Barrera.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Fabinho (Philadelphia Union) left footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the right
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Fabinho nearly puts the Union up three

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Sheanon Williams.

timelineItems.name: jesterwords
timelineItems.text: Fred might go 50 and then I want to see @ZachPfeffer_27 on the field. #DOOP #CHVvPHL

timelineItems.name: Derek Rawlings
timelineItems.text: Ughhh #chivasusa is just baaaad. In not sure if they've directed one shot at the net yet.

timelineItems.name: TWC Deportes
timelineItems.text: 66' Tras una desconcentración en la media de @cdchivasusa, Conor Casey mete el segundo gol para @PhilaUnion tras centro de Maidana. #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Fabinho (Philadelphia Union) left footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Cristián Maidana.

timelineItems.name: Chris Harris
timelineItems.text: Conor Casey scores a brace, and all is right on the world. #DOOP

timelineItems.desc: Eric Avila (Chivas USA) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Eric Avila cautioned for a late slide

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Fred (Philadelphia Union).
Ryan Finley (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Evan Snyder
timelineItems.text: Hack, PLEASE KEEP THIS STARTING LINEUP. You have finally found one that is working, and they look great #DOOP @PhilaUnion

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Maurice Edu (Philadelphia Union) because of an injury.
Maurice Edu (Philadelphia Union) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Eric Avila (Chivas USA).
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: The U Match Day
timelineItems.text: Edu down for a moment, but he walks off after receiving treatment. #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: Andre Sherard
timelineItems.text: Union in control of this match. Don’t see how they give up the two goal advantage. #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: Mike McGuire
timelineItems.text: It would take a lot to beat out Defoe for goal of the week but I think Connor Casey just did it #tfc #doop

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Chivas USA 0, Philadelphia Union 3. Cristian Maidana (Philadelphia Union) right footed shot from the left side of the box to the bottom right
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Cristian Maidana cuts back and scores the Union's third

timelineItems.name: dillasdonuts
timelineItems.text: #ChivasUSA has now gone 19 consecutive games without a clean sheet (or 1 CS in their last 27 games). #DirtyLaundry

timelineItems.name: The U Match Day
timelineItems.text: And Casey comes off in place of Wenger, as the traveling Union fans give the striker a well-deserved round of applause. #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: Scott Kessler
timelineItems.text: Wenger in for Casey, because taking a guy out on a hattrick with 15 minutes to go, away, is how a coach endears himself to players.

timelineItems.name: Dave Zeitlin
timelineItems.text: This game is calling out for a Conor Casey hat trick.

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: Maidana gets a goal as #ChivasUSA protests no offside call. Union 3-0, 77th minute

timelineItems.name: The U Match Day
timelineItems.text: And the @PhilaUnion add a third!!! Maidana curls in a shot with his right to put the Union up, 3-0. #DOOP #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: Jim Pisani
timelineItems.text: Maidana makes it 3-nil! #DOOP

timelineItems.comment: Eric Avila (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Fred (Philadelphia Union).

timelineItems.name: jesterwords
timelineItems.text: 2 more goals for 5-0! #DOOP

timelineItems.name: Joe Tansey
timelineItems.text: If this was hockey, Wenger would've received 2 minutes for interference. #DOOP #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: Evan Snyder
timelineItems.text: Think Wenger was offside, but CHOCOOOOO!!! Seriously, Hack, keep this lineup. It's a thing of beauty to watch #DOOP @PhilaUnion

timelineItems.name: Scott Kessler
timelineItems.text: How the hell was Wenger not called for an offside there? He literally dummied the ball in front of Kennedy while offside.

timelineItems.name: Alex
timelineItems.text: This is the best I've seen the @PhilaUnion play all season #DOOP

timelineItems.name: Brian B.
timelineItems.text: HAIRCUTS FOR EVERYONE! #DOOP #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: Dave Zeitlin
timelineItems.text: In fairness, the Union have been working on the Cristian-Maidana-shoots-between-Andrew-Wenger's-legs-in-front-of-goal play for a while now.

timelineItems.name: BC8
timelineItems.text: Love me that passive offsides rule #DOOP

timelineItems.name: Andrew Kropp
timelineItems.text: 3-0 union tonight! #DOOP #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: Mark Graves
timelineItems.text: Thank you Wenger! Maidana with the nice footwork and goal. #DOOP #uniontalk

timelineItems.name: Andre Sherard
timelineItems.text: Maidana has been incredible from what I’ve seen. Wenger was interfering with the play tho. #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: jesterwords
timelineItems.text: Awful gift goal, but hey, we can't give it back to them. #DOOP #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: Chris Spina
timelineItems.text: So a handball and missed offsides have HELPED the #Union that's never happened #DOOP

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Danny Cruz (Philadelphia Union).
Oswaldo Minda (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOAL! Cristián Maidana, not satisfied as just the set up man, scores a goal of his own to give @PhilaUnion the 3-0 lead. #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.text: Great goal maidana #DOOP

timelineItems.text: These offside interpretations are hell for goalkeepers. #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.text: Seems like Wenger was involved in that play in an offside position. But, what do I know. #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.name: DLH
timelineItems.text: 3-0 = peffer, please! #doop

timelineItems.name: Ron Waxman
timelineItems.text: How is that third Union goal not called back for offsides? #CHVvPHI

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Raymon Gaddis.

timelineItems.name: Dave Zeitlin
timelineItems.text: Cristian Maidana playing SO much better in road games that start late on the East Coast is probably the best storyline in sports right now.

timelineItems.desc: Dan Haiek and Armchair Analyst Matt Doyle preview the Saturday night match between Chivas USA and the Philadelphia Union. The visitors haven't posted a shutout in their last 6 games, but should we expect that streak to halt against the Goats? Despite a lack of results in recent weeks the Union attack has looked sharp. Does Chivas have an answer for the 4-3-3? Find out Saturday at 1030pm ET on MLS Live.
timelineItems.title: Chivas USA vs. Philadelphia Union May 31, 2014 Preview | Scouting Report

timelineItems.name: Scott Kessler
timelineItems.text: This game could be 1-1 as easily as it is 3-0 right now.
